alert.note: Alert for San Juan River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 30 at 5:31PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Archuleta County through 600 PM MDT... At 531 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Pagosa Springs, or 13 miles northwest of Dulce, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pagosa Springs and Lonetree. This includes the following highways... U.S. Highway 84 in Colorado between mile markers 18 and 27. U.S. Highway 160 in Colorado between mile markers 134 and 155. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: San Juan River Basin; Southwest San Juan Mountains
